query.name: upload_image
query.description: The proof picture to be uploaded must be within 10MB in size, and the format only supports .jpg, .jpeg, and .png. Only one picture is allowed to be uploaded per request. If multiple pictures are uploaded, only the first picture will be processed.

request_examples.code:
<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, array(
  CURLOPT_URL => 'https://partner.shopeemobile.com/api/v2/returns/convert_image?access_token=access_token&partner_id=partner_id&shop_id=shop_id&sign=sign&timestamp=timestamp',
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => '',
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 0,
  CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION => true,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => 'POST',
  CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => array('upload_image'=> new CURLFILE('/path/to/file') /* Replace with actual file path */),
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array(
    'Content-Type: application/json'
  ),
));

$response = curl_exec($curl);

curl_close($curl);
echo $response;

curl --location --request POST 'https://partner.shopeemobile.com/api/v2/returns/convert_image?access_token=access_token&partner_id=partner_id&shop_id=shop_id&sign=sign&timestamp=timestamp' \
--form 'upload_image=@"/path/to/file"'  #replace the sample path with your file path

schema.name: request_id
schema.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

schema.name: error
schema.description: Indicate error code if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: message
schema.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: url
schema.description: The link uploaded to the image server can be used with the upload_proof interface.
